game.name: Time Carnage VR
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 타임 카나지는 미친 듯이 날뛰는 VR 서바이벌 슈터 게임이다. 시간 여행을 하면서 공룡, 괴물, 로봇, 좀비들이 득실대는 세상을 날려 버리자. 무시무시한 맹공격에서 살아남기 위해 무기를 잠금 해제하고 업그레이드하라!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Time Carnage is a frantic VR survival wave shooter with a frenzy inducing time-reload system. Travel through time and wreak havoc through worlds swarming with dinosaurs, monsters, robots and zombies. Shoot, drop, switch, repeat!

reviewHighlights.text: this is a good og vr game to get if you wanna know how some old vr games were like and its still good to this day and can be a lot of fun still
